location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Benjamin Jervis, East India Company Resident at Bushere [Bushire], to Peter Elwin Wrench, East India Company Agent at Bussora [Basra]

mods.abstract: The letter gives an account of the ' IslamabadAffair', the murder of the captain and officers aboard the Company ship, the Islamabad, by the Arab seamen serving on board, and the subsequent plunder of its treasure.
